review: This thing is great! Pretty much turns your non-smart TV into a smart TV. I Definitely recommend.
author: bryan groda

review: Works as expected and received when promised.
author: Robert G.

review: This is a good product, but I was very disappointed and the lack of apps available for it in the App Store. Some of the movie apps I already have on my android phone are not available in the App Store for this firestick which makes it hard to watch the digital copies of my movies.
author: Jason Belcher

review: Works great....just what I wanted for my TV in the kitchen....now I have more viewing options to choose from.  Prime movies ,TV and music in addition to my DirecTV.
author: Frances Petty

review: I have a question to ask! Can any one tell me how to download adthe.eu  on my amazon fire strict tv
author: mutiu abdulwahab

review: I have a apple TV and 2 firesticks. I am happy with them, i just wish they had more apps. for example, i am subscribed to HBO Now, but the firesticks do not have them, so i have to watch it on my apple TV
author: missy

review: I didn't like the stick at all. I already had a chromecast and it is much more user friendly.
author: Selby Bagale

review: A best buy for sure for convenience. Easy to install, works great, the remote is fantastic and a low cost item to boot. Had it up and running in 5 to 10 minutes. The most difficult part was opening the remote to put in the battery. After that small hurdle was met, nothing but convenience and made Prime even easier to use. I like simple things that work well and this did!
author: Charles Coffey "Decorah Lion"
